page.title: 08A Typical Sunday
page.content: We did a survey on a typical Sunday and we found out that: 30 people had a bath; 25 read newspapers; 25 watch television; 20 do housework; 20 go to the beach; 18 visit relatives; 17 go cycling; 17 go swimming; 17 play badminton; 13 do gardening;13 play with a computer; 12 play football; 11 go for a walk; 8 play cards; 8 go jogging; 7 go shopping; 5 go to church; 5 play records; 4 visit granny; 3 go to the Amusement Arcade; 3 go to Sunday School; 2 go horse riding; 2 go fishing. At the end we noticed that adults do about the same things but they mostly go to clubs and pubs as well.
